src:
Seto Nurdiyantoro: PSS Sleman Sudah 40 Poin, Saya Ingin Lebih
07 Nov 2019, 08:22 by Tempo.co, Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PSS Sleman kini telah mendapatkan 40 poin di Shopee Liga 1 2019. Raihan 40 poin biasanya dianggap sebagai zona aman bagi tim untuk terhindar dari degradasi. Namun, raihan tersebut tidak membuat pelatih Seto Nurdiyantoro merasa puas.
Poin ke-40 didapat PSS saat bermain imbang 0-0 melawan pemuncak klasemen Bali United. Laga pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019 tersebut digelar di Stadion Maguwoharjo, Sleman, pada Rabu 6 November 2019.
"Kalau dari awal saya inginnya dapat 40 poin ke atas, bisa dapat 43. Itu mungkin aman. Tapi, 40 mungkin juga aman. Tapi, saya juga belajar dari musim lalu. Ini di Indonesia, semua bisa terjadi," ucap Seto Nurdiyantoro.
Menurut Seto, raihan 40 poin sama sekali belum membuat PSS aman dari degradasi. Sebab, dia melihat ada progres signifikan dari tim-tim di papan bawah. Mereka terus mendapat poin dan persaingan masih terbuka.
"Kalau mau aman ya harus di atas 43 poin. Ini mungkin. Saya belum bisa katakan aman karena belum berakhir kompetisi. Ini hanya perkiraan kotor saja," kata pelatih berusia 45 tahun tersebut.
Dari sisi permainan, Seto menilai laga lawan Bali United berjalan dengan tempo yang biasa-biasa saja. Tidak ada aksi jual beli serangan. Walau demikian, ada satu hal yang membuat Seto cukup puas.
"Ada beberapa pemain yang memang kami rotasi dan hasilnya bagus. Saya bangga dengan pemain. Mereka telah membuktikan bahwa mereka bisa, walau yang kami hadapi dari materi bisa dikatakan lebih baik," kata Seto.
Ia melakukan sejumlah rotasi susunan pemain PSS Sleman di laga melawan Bali United. Yehvhen Bokhashvili dan Dave Mustaine dicadangkan. Sedangkan, Kushedya Hari Yudo dan Sidik Saimima bermain sejak menit awal. Arif Satya Yudha juga diberi debut dan bermain sejak menit pertama.

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
Seto Nurdiyantoro: PSS Sleman Has 40 Points, I Want More
Nov 7 2019, 08:22 by Tempo.co, Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Sleman PSS has now gained 40 points in Shopee Liga 1 2019. 40 points is usually considered a safe zone for the team to avoid relegation. However, these achievements did not make coach Seto Nurdiyantoro satisfied.
The 40th point gained PSS during a 0-0 draw against top leaders Bali United. The 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 match 2019 was held at Maguwoharjo Stadium, Sleman, on Wednesday 6 November 2019.
"If from the beginning I wanted to get 40 points up, could get 43. That might be safe. But, 40 might also be safe. But, I also learned from last season. This in Indonesia, everything can happen," said Seto Nurdiyantoro.
According to Seto, achieving 40 points did not make PSS safe from degradation. Because, he saw a significant progress from the teams at the bottom of the board. They continue to get points and competition is still open.
"If you want to be safe it must be above 43 points. This is possible. I can't say it's safe because the competition hasn't ended yet. It's just a dirty estimate," the 45-year-old coach said.
From the side of the game, Seto assess the match against Bali United runs with a mediocre tempo. There was no buying and selling attacks. However, there is one thing that makes Seto quite satisfied.
"There are some players that we rotate and the results are good. I am proud of the players. They have proven that they can, even though what we face from the material can be said to be better," Seto said.
He made a number of rotations in the formation of Sleman PSS players in the match against Bali United. Yehvhen Bokhashvili and Dave Mustaine are reserved. Meanwhile, Kushedya Hari Yudo and Sidik Saimima played since the early minutes. Arif Satya Yudha was also given his debut and played since the first minute.

INDONESIA LIGA
